title: 7k ping EU / Nordic
body: Hi. Anyone have this problem? 2 of us have 7k ping for no reason lol.

replies.body: Has this been happening rather consistently? This kind of crazy ping spike almost always means your ISP is having some issues or your network isn't able to get a clear signal for whatever reason anymore. I'd first double check with your ISP to see what might be going on, as I've gotten a good deal of reports from EUNE players having ISP troubles today.
Do restart, it should fix it.
yea, I have the same exact problem - 6/7k ping - I can't even move {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
Reconnect. It helps. Hopefully they fix those servers
